Html:
Can anyone explain the origin of the name "Prism"?
Any links to where that is documented?

My own guess is as follows:
An optical prism can be used to break up light into its component colors.
Similarly, "Prism" can be used to help break up code into modules.

Thanks,
Alex

Hi Alex,

I find your interpretation interesting. As far as I know, this is the code name of the project and there is no official information how it has been assigned.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero

Hi Alex,

The Prism names comes (at least that was the first time I saw it) from this post by Glenn Block: "PRISM - something like PResentation Integration SysteM."

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman

Hi Damian and Fernando,

Thanks for the explanation.  Your link to Glenn Block's 2008-01 blog post was the kind of thing I was looking for.

Thanks again,
Alex
